actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning April 4, 1976, as National Rural Health Week.

summary.text: Designates the week beginning April 4, 1976, as "National Rural Health Week." Urges that efforts in disseminating health information be intensified. Calls for improved health services for rural America.

titles.title: Resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning April 4, 1976, as National Rural Health Week.
